title: Dancing figure, part of centerpiece
description: dancing figure mounted on vase with side compartments to hold flowers; part of a centerpiece consisting of 12 dancing figures attached to bases, six of which have compartments to hold flowers, a garland of gilded beads, and a central vase surrounded by four figures
creditline: Gift of Mrs. H. T. Morrison in memory of Lucia L. Peavey Heffelfinger
